text: Giorgio Nuti (born 17 February 1954) is an Italian equestrian. He competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics, the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Giorgio Nuti
